name: Captain Spacesphere
description:
Made for the One Hour Game Jam of 2/29/20.

Captain Spacesphere is the best capsuledood to ever pilot a Spacesphere, hence the name. Navigate through the asteroid fields to the golden portals to win!

Use WASD to move laterally, and hold Space to move up. The vacuum of space's gravity will move you down automatically. Space does that in this future because I said so.
